entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ForeignKeyPropertyDiscoveryConvention doesn't trigger when a shadow property is added that matches the property created implicitly #25830
  • How to compare json string when using JsonValueConverter #25823
  • Add CodeGeneratedAttribute to migrations/snapshots #25820
  • Enable throwing when accessing non-included property when eager loading #25818
  • Move Thread_safety_in_relational_command_cache out of QueryBugsTest #25815
  • How to use IncludeProperties on HasIndex for a mix of base and derived entities using TPH? #25813
  • Precompiling models and missing usings #25812
  • Investigate timeouts on Mac builds #25811
    MQ

Closed

  • Update SQL Server transient error list #25050
    6.0.0
  • Login Failed for user during Migrate() on Azure. Error number: 18456 #15644
    6.0.0
  • Cosmos: `Dictionary<int, string>` properties do not generate any errors, but don't map correctly #25749
    6.0.0
  • Offset is not preserved when saving DateTimeOffset to Cosmos #24684
    6.0.0
  • InvalidCastException for some provider when cast enum to underlying type in linq and compare to an different integer type in db #21770
    6.0.0
  • Relational: No tests for TranslateContains path #24671
    6.0.0
  • FromSqlParameterExpandingExpressionVisitor incorrect works with (invariant) parameterName #25822
  • context.Model.FindEntityType(Type type) throws "The string argument 'name' cannot be empty." #14267
    6.0.0
  • NRE when adding property named "Count" to a property bag entity type #25485
    6.0.0
  • Entity deleted when required principal is swapped instead of an exception. #22391
    6.0.0
  • SqlServer does not read DbNull for null value in rowversion column #22256
    6.0.0
  • Setting property to null with composite nullable foreign key incorrectly deletes entire row #22196
  • Hang `CosmosQueryableExtensions.FromSqlRaw` from `DbSet` #25778
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Multiple self-referencing foreign keys: Unable to determine the relationship represented by navigation property. -5.0.0-preview.7 #21968
    6.0.0-rc2

PullRequests

Created

  • Configure requiredness based on NRT even if principal end might be ambiguous. #25831
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25825
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Be more explicit about which overloads of HasConversion to use with compiled model #25816
  • More links to conceptual docs #25814

Merged

  • Update SQL Server transient error list #25832
  • Cosmos: Don't map collections as owned types #25827
  • Fix pipeline yaml #25829
  • Query: Convert enum to underlying CLR type in type mapping when type … #25793
  • Fix to #24671 - Relational: No tests for TranslateContains path #25768
  • Don't look for CLR properties on property bag entity types #25809
  • Add regression test for cycle detection using lazy-loading proxies #25821
  • Enable test for Projecting_column_with_value_converter_of_ulong_byte_array #25817
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0' => 'main' #25810
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25801
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Use new Hosted build pools #25808
  • Use new Hosted build pools #25807
  • Change Cosmos FromSqlRaw to be over DbSet #25805
  • Configure self-referencing navigations when disambiguated by ForeignKey attributes #25806

Updated

  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_e_sqlite3 from 2.0.5-pre20210521085756 to 2.0.5 #25787
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
